projectPurpose: To provide a foundational "network of networks" that enables different blockchains to connect, communicate, and transact with each other securely and efficiently, addressing limitations of previous blockchain generations regarding interoperability and scalability to support the development of a decentralized web (Web3).
mainFeatures: Scalability through multi-chain architecture (Relay Chain, Parachains)
Shared security model for connected chains

alternatives.name: Cardano
mainFeatures: Focus on scalability, security, and sustainability

alternatives.name: Avalanche
mainFeatures: High transaction speed and low finality
Support for dApps and custom blockchains

marketPositioning: Polkadot is positioned as a leading platform for blockchain interoperability and a foundational layer for Web3. Its unique architecture, featuring a central Relay Chain providing shared security to connected parachains, differentiates it from many other blockchain platforms that operate as single, independent chains. While competitors like Cosmos also focus on interoperability, Polkadot's pooled security model is a key distinction. Polkadot aims to enable a diverse ecosystem of specialized blockchains to seamlessly interact and share data, addressing critical challenges of scalability and interoperability faced by earlier blockchain generations.
